item.title: Cisco IPS–Inline VLAN Pair mode
item.description: Setup Cisco IPS on EVE I failed to setup Cisco IPS on EVE(ver 2.0.3-53). I Downloaded Cisco IPS ova file via certcollection (mega) Followed the [instructions](http://certcollection.org/forum/topic/266792-emulating-ips-on-unl/ http://www.cznetlab.cz/index.php?cat=cciesec&subcat=unlips) for IPS Interfaces. and met the issue: Cisco IPS failed to ping anything out of it, I run traffic capture on IPS’s interface, no packet out when I execute ping command. Related post on EVE official forum, and the official answer is: This image is corrupted and not working neither on UNL nor EVE
